title: Cycling’s ‘Super 6’ in 2025: Where the Peloton’s Mega-Stars Will Race Next Season
content:
Pogačar, Vingegaard, Evenepoel, Roglič, Van der Poel and Van Aert form elite men's 'Super 6,' but they won't be crossing paths too often in 2025.

Read the full article at Cycling’s ‘Super 6’ in 2025: Where the Peloton’s Mega-Stars Will Race Next Season on Velo.
author: ahood
